thread.title: Moncler Pays Tribute to the Chinese New Year With Special-Edition Jackets
thread.title_full: Moncler Pays Tribute to the Chinese New Year With Special-Edition Jackets

author: Marcus Cho
title: Moncler Pays Tribute to the Chinese New Year With Special-Edition Jackets
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
In celebration of the upcoming Chinese New Year, Moncler has unveiled a special-edition tribute jacket, inspired by the Year of the Rooster.
Available in both men’s and women’s editions, the special-edition jackets will offer an oriental-themed colorway of fiery red, with accenting gold highlights. Additionally, on the women’s jacket you’ll find an all-over Rooster brocade print for the women’s jacket, and an embroidered Rooster motif on the back panel of the men’s design. Both jackets will be reversible, with trademark Moncler quilting being the alternative offering, and each design is completed with statement gold hardware.
The Moncler Chinese New Year 2017 jackets will be available starting January 2017 at all Moncler boutiques as well as online .
